com.avanza.astrix.beans.service

Interface ServiceComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectComponent, DirectComponent, GsComponent, GsLocalViewComponent, GsRemotingComponent, NettyRemotingComponent

    public interface ServiceComponent
    Used on the client side to bind to service exported over the service-registry.

    Used on the server side to export a services using a given mechanism.

    Author:
    Elias Lindholm (elilin)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> BoundServiceBeanInstance<T> bind(ServiceDefinition<T> serviceDefinition, ServiceProperties serviceProperties)
      Creates an bound service-instance for a given service definition.

      • createServiceProperties

        <T> ServiceProperties createServiceProperties(ServiceDefinition<T> exportedServiceDefinition)
        Creates ServiceProperties for a given exportedService. Before this method is inoked, the exportService(Class, Object, ServiceDefinition) method will be invoked with the same exported ServiceDefinition
        Parameters:
        exportedServiceDefinition - ServiceDefinition for the service to create ServiceProperties for.
        Returns:

      • getName

        String getName()
        The name of this component.
        Returns:

      • canBindType

        boolean canBindType(Class<?> type)
        Defines whether this ServiceComponent can be used to bind a bean of a given type. If this ServiceComponent can be used to bind the given type, then #parseServiceProviderUri(Class) should create ServiceProperties that can be passed to #bind(Class, ServiceDefinition, ServiceProperties) to bind to an instance of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:

      • exportService

        <T> void exportService(Class<T> providedApi,
                       T provider,
                       ServiceDefinition<T> serviceDefinition)
        Exports a given service on the server side. After a service is exported it should be possible to call createServiceProperties(ServiceDefinition) to receive ServiceProperties for the ServiceDefinition, and later to call bind(ServiceDefinition, ServiceProperties) to get a proxy that can invoke the passied in provider.
        Parameters:
        providedApi -
        provider - - The target provider instance
        serviceDefinition - - ServiceDefinition for service to be exported

      • requiresProviderInstance

        boolean requiresProviderInstance()
        Defines whether an instance implementing a provided api is required when invoking ServiceComponent.exportService. If true, Astrix will identify an instance that implements the given api and pass it to the exportService method and never pass null. If this property is false then null will be passed to exportService.
        Returns:
